page.title: 14A WEEKEND IN SHERE
page.content:
At the weekend I went out to London with Mummy and Auntie Ruth and Auntie Jane. We had to go on the train. We went to a place where there were beautiful parasols,sitting on a chair was a lady she was wearing tights like spiders webs and black shoes,a black dress and black net over her face. We went into a shop and I bought a pencil with a rubber on top and a stick with a parrot on top. After that we went to the theatre to see the show 'Forty Second Street'. Suddenly they banged huge coins down onto the stage. Then they came on with garlands of flowers and pretty green dresses. Next there was a bit of ballet,and oh dear,a lady broke her ankle and another one took her place. Then it was the end and they had a lovely finale.
By Lucy Barker aged 8 years
